name: Asteroids But With Gravity
description:
Up arrow to boost, left & right arrows to rotate, and spacebar to shoot.

The rules are the same as standard Asteroids, but there are also planets that pull you in with gravity. There are also no bonus spaceships to shoot, just asteroids. Bullets will also decrease in size with repeated shooting, and boosting will increase the size of bullets.

I made this as a learning project to become familiar with Unreal Engine 4, so it's a bit buggy.
